subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|米|斗|ls=ic|t1=rice|t2=dipper}} – to measure; to gauge.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=liào,er=y
|c=liu6-2,liu6
|h=pfs=liau
|md=lâiu/liêu/lièu
|md_note=lâiu - vernacular (noun); liêu - literary (verb: “to measure; to consider; to estimate”); lièu - obsolete literary (verb: “to oversee; to manage”), now merged into ''liêu''
|mn=liāu
|mn-t=liao7/liou7
|mn-t_note=liao7 - Shantou; liou7 - Chaozhou
|w=3liau
|mc=y
|oc=y
|ma=y
|cat=v,n
}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[anticipate]]; to [[predict]]; to [[foresee]]; to [[expect]]
# to [[oversee]]; to [[manage]]; to [[deal]] with
# [[material]]; [[matter]]; [[substance]]
# [[ingredient]]; [[constituent]]; [[component]]
# material {{gloss|person or thing suited for a certain purpose}}; [[makings]]
#: {{zh-x|他 不是 當兵 的 料。|He is not born to be a soldier.}}
